text: Trey Lorenz (born Lloyd Lorenz Smith; January 19, 1969) is an American singer and songwriter. He has been a backing vocalist for Mariah Carey and Selena. His 1992 single "Someone to Hold", reached number 19 on the US Billboard Hot 100, number five on the Hot R&B;/Hip Hop Songs and number 65 on the UK Singles Chart. == Discography == *Trey Lorenz (1992) *Mr. Mista (2006) ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from South Carolina Category:American R&B; singers Category:African-American musicians
title: Trey Lorenz
